\block{research interests}

\begin{itemize}
\item Brain-inspired machine intelligence, deep learning for pose estimation and action recognition
\item Neural decoding, computational neuroscience, memory-driven learning
\item Privacy and security in AI systems, human-AI alignment
\end{itemize}
